attributes.action: Pull out of the EU urgently!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Between '92 and '02 the Uk put £104bn into the E.U and got back £64bn thats a £40bn loss. that is 160 state of the art hospitals with 128,000 more beds than now. We get stupid laws and endless red tape about what we can and can't do.over that period it cost each member of the poulation (pop. 59million est.) £678 and that is just the net loss. We could count the whole £104bn as it was not spend in ways that we would have spent it if we were independent. that meant it cost every U.K citizen £1,763 per year.GET US OUT!
